channel.title: *NEW* RSCPirate Online 24/7. 1+ players! 1/8/10
channel.description:
1/8/10 Come join me..all alone..peak at 3 players.
*You don't need to register just type in a username and password and it will create the account.*
Due to the server being new I have created some dummy account with 99 smithing and mining. Username: imakerune2 imakerune3 Password: rscpirate rscpirate
15 accounts created!..2 of them are mine.
Looking for a team.
first few lucky people will receive some items.
EXP rates: medium
EasyRSC source with edits.--credits to xEnt for source.
Client: http://uppit.com/v/SHD56XKR
http://www.mediafire.com/?zm2ngnt0dg2
Kind of just putting server online to see what happens could use suggestion on additions in game such as shops ect ect. The all around goal for the server is so be a good server no corrupt staff flawless economy. Website comming soon if all goes well, planning on buying VPS when I hit about 15+ active players.
*due to random IP switch last night server was down for god knows how long. Think this may cause a problem hope it doesn't happen again.*
[URL=http://img245.imageshack.us/i/masterfisher.jpg/][IMG]http://img245.imageshack.us/img245/7140/masterfisher.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img245/masterfisher.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img245.imageshack.us/img245/masterfisher.jpg/1/w507.png[/img][/URL]
